tag.name: table

attribute.description: It indicates whether the table should be striped rows. Default : false
attribute.name: stripe

attribute.description: It indicates whether the table should be dark theme. Default : false
attribute.name: dark

attribute.description: It indicates whether the table should be hovered rows. Default : false
attribute.name: hover

attribute.description: It indicates whether the table should be small size. Default : false
attribute.name: small

attribute.description: It indicates whether the table should be bordered. Default : false
attribute.name: border

tag.example: <html:table dark="true" hover="true" stripe="true"> <html:table-caption> Caption </html:table-caption> <html:table-header light="true"> <html:table-row> <html:table-head>Head 1</html:table-head> </html:table-row> </html:table-header> <html:table-body> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Column 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-body> <html:table-footer> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Foot 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Foot value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-footer> </html:table>

tag.description: Renders a line of a table
tag.name: table-row

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered. Default : true
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Indicates the table line state. Default: default. Options: success, danger, info, default, primary
attribute.name: state

tag.example: <html:table dark="true" hover="true" stripe="true"> <html:table-caption> Caption </html:table-caption> <html:table-header light="true"> <html:table-row> <html:table-head>Head 1</html:table-head> </html:table-row> </html:table-header> <html:table-body> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Column 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-body> <html:table-footer> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Foot 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Foot value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-footer> </html:table>

tag.name: table-data

attribute.description: Indicates the column state. Default: default. Options: success, danger, info, default, primary
attribute.name: state

attribute.description: It indicates a label for column content
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: It indicates a label (i18n) for column content
attribute.name: labelKey

attribute.description: Indicates the number of columns that this column should fill
attribute.name: colspan

tag.example: <html:table dark="true" hover="true" stripe="true"> <html:table-caption> Caption </html:table-caption> <html:table-header light="true"> <html:table-row> <html:table-head>Head 1</html:table-head> </html:table-row> </html:table-header> <html:table-body> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Column 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-body> <html:table-footer> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Foot 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Foot value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-footer> </html:table>

tag.name: table-caption

attribute.description: It indicates a label for column content
attribute.name: label

tag.example: <html:table dark="true" hover="true" stripe="true"> <html:table-caption> Caption </html:table-caption> <html:table-header light="true"> <html:table-row> <html:table-head>Head 1</html:table-head> </html:table-row> </html:table-header> <html:table-body> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Column 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-body> <html:table-footer> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Foot 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Foot value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-footer> </html:table>

tag.name: table-body
tag.example: <html:table dark="true" hover="true" stripe="true"> <html:table-caption> Caption </html:table-caption> <html:table-header light="true"> <html:table-row> <html:table-head>Head 1</html:table-head> </html:table-row> </html:table-header> <html:table-body> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Column 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-body> <html:table-footer> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Foot 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Foot value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-footer> </html:table>

tag.name: table-header

attribute.description: It indicates whether the table header should be dark theme. Default : false
attribute.name: dark

attribute.description: It indicates whether the table header should be light theme. Default : false
attribute.name: light

tag.example: <html:table dark="true" hover="true" stripe="true"> <html:table-caption> Caption </html:table-caption> <html:table-header light="true"> <html:table-row> <html:table-head>Head 1</html:table-head> </html:table-row> </html:table-header> <html:table-body> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Column 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-body> <html:table-footer> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Foot 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Foot value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-footer> </html:table>

tag.name: table-footer
tag.example: <html:table dark="true" hover="true" stripe="true"> <html:table-caption> Caption </html:table-caption> <html:table-header light="true"> <html:table-row> <html:table-head>Head 1</html:table-head> </html:table-row> </html:table-header> <html:table-body> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Column 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-body> <html:table-footer> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Foot 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Foot value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-footer> </html:table>

tag.name: table-head

attribute.description: It indicates a label for column head content
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: It indicates a label (i18n) for column head content
attribute.name: labelKey

tag.example: <html:table dark="true" hover="true" stripe="true"> <html:table-caption> Caption </html:table-caption> <html:table-header light="true"> <html:table-row> <html:table-head>Head 1</html:table-head> </html:table-row> </html:table-header> <html:table-body> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Column 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-body> <html:table-footer> <html:table-row> <html:tabel-data>Foot 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> <html:table-row state="danger"> <html:tabel-data>Foot value 1</html:tabel-data> </html:table-row> </html:table-footer> </html:table>
